skill.name: Sylvio's Showstopping Performance
skill.description: Can be used when your Life Points decrease by 1500. This Skill can only be used once per Duel. Instead of conducting a Normal Draw, draw an "Abyss Actor" or "Yosenju" monster of your choice. In addition, add a Pendulum Zone to your field if you begin the Duel with a Deck that has 9 or more "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monsters or "Yosenju" monsters. (Extra Deck does not count.)

linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Sylvio Sawatari
linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Sylvio Sawatari. His decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements. This article will help you farm him as efficiently as possible.

children.content: Earn 500,000 or more Duel Assessment points in a Duel World  (ARC-V) Duel.
Win 3 Duels against Sylvio Sawatari whiel playing as
Win against Sylvio Sawatari whith a Duel Assesment of at least 4000.
Perfom 3 Pendulum Summon(s) in one Duel against Sylvio Sawatari using

skill.name: Sealed Tombs
skill.description: Can be used if your Life Points are lower than your opponent's by 1000 or more. Until the end of your opponent's next turn, neither player can banish cards from the Graveyard or Special Summon monsters from the Graveyard. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Ishizu Ishtar efficiently! Her decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements.
linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Ishizu Ishtar

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
Ishizu Ishtar level 40 appears at the gate upon reaching stage 30
Summon LIGHT Monster(s) 200 time(s) in total.
Win 1 Duel (s) against Ishizu Ishtar at Level 30 in Duel World.
Win a Duel against Ishizu Ishatar with at least 6,000 LP remaining.
